sia-desc: Allows for adding annotations to image files.
sia-i18n-welcome: Willkommen bei der Lokalisierungs- und Internationalisierungsdatei der Programmerweiterung Annotator.
sia-special-intro: Welcome on the Semantic Image Annotator Extensions Special Page.
sia-button-desc: Click here to annotate this article.
sia-repair-button-desc: Click here to repair moved annotations.
sia-repair-notification: Not all Annotations could be assigned correctly. Please start the Annotations Repair Mode.
sia-autogenerate-summary: Page was autogenerated by Semantic Image Annotator Extension.
sia-install-description: Please click Install Button before using this Extension.
sia-install-success: Installation finished successfully. Please Reload the Page.
sia-category-pageform-assignment-descrip: Here you are able to setup the Annotation Categories used by this Extension. Therefor you have to assign a PageForms Form to any category and select a color.
sia-main-page-description: This Page shows all Annotations of the File
sia-please-install: You have not yet installed the Extension. Please go to Special Page.
sia-repair-welcome-text: In the following steps you are able to correct the moved annotation positions.
sia-repair-info-text: After clicking Repair you have to select the annotations new position.
sia-repair-all-done-text: Now you will be redirected to the article page.
